summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1510, for the improvement of Norman Street, from Twenty-third Avenue South, on the south to Twenty-sixth Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16192 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
